talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Sorry, I forgot an important rule of the
<clr:0000>Secret Club<clr:ffff>—everyone's business is
their own.
You'll be safe from the guards here, so
feel free to take all the time you need to
look at the things we sell.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>That outfit... <sp:5:0:0>It would be best if the guards
didn't see you dressed that way.

But besides that...
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>The desert may be a warm place, but I
would really appreciate it if you'd wear
a little bit more clothing, OK?
But besides that...
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>That outfit... <sp:5:0:0>It would be best if the guards
didn't see you dressed that way.

Hm.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>I was...not expecting a voe to suddenly
appear right before my eyes. Nearly made
me jump out of my skin!
I should thank you though. I had a crick
in my back, but the shock of your arrival
seems to have fixed it!
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>My husband is a Hylian voe too. Imagine
if he'd been the one suddenly appearing!
But obviously he isn't allowed into town...
Since it is customary for Gerudo to return
to town at a certain age, our daughter
and I moved back here...
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_01>I warned my husband—several times—that
voe were not allowed inside the town and
were sometimes jailed, but...
Well, he insisted on traveling with us all
the way here, and I saw him eyeing the
town walls when we parted ways.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Wabbin... I wonder what you're up to right now...<sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Anyway, once you're done shopping,
you'd better get out of town before any
of the guards catch you.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, you're back? I'm surprised the guards
haven't found you. Normally they're pretty
good at catching intruders...
Usually when a voe tries to sneak into
town, he's quickly caught by the guards
and thrown into <clr:0000>jail<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>I won't turn you in, of course, but once
you're done shopping, you should get out
of town before the guards find you.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Wow, I see another Hylian voe and all I can think
about is my husband...

Wabbin... What are you up to right now?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
